title: How to pick myself up and keep moving forward - Quora

response.answer_text: By having a purpose greater than yourself, by focusing on goal accomplishments that take you closer to that goal. If you have an overcritical mind, if you don’t take control of your focus and move it to something else, you will spin negatively. With goals, you can look back at your progress, especially when it feels like you aren’t making any. Your focus is one of the few things you can control. Use it to your advantage!
